Blog.post: went out today at around 7pm ++ to jurong east..to eat dinner at LJS with chiu bee and another two friends of hers..called darren and zhiwei..haha..though this is my second time seeing them, they gave me my birthday present..haha..they still thought it was my birthday today w0rh..haha..made me feel so paisehx takin their present. why ahz? like i veri bhb.lols.haha..but its okiez..im' so happi to be aware that weijian is also planning to give me present..hehe..maybe what i'm after is the presents not the thought..haha..darren & stanley gave me one braclet..its' very nice..i love that very muchz. but i lied saying that it's chiu bee who gave me the braclet so as to avoid suspicision from my mummy..isn't it a bit lame?? wellz,,i dunoe..for tmlz..i have no idea whether to go and watch the movie or notz leh. seems to be so expensive..and plus..i've no time for my studies liao..muahha..i don't care le lar..so long got present can liaoz..haha..isn't me abit realistic?? or super super materialistic...wahhz...haha....i dunoe larh.. i made up my mind liao...mitchZz....this guy shall hold an important place in my heart no matter what..i will not give up for the next 3 years..at least i wont' . i love ya. =) but i don't pin for your love. i don't wish to be the third party. just wanna stay by your side no matter what happenz k? love ya always..thinkin of ya..nites to all..~

To maKe thinGz shoRt, i DonT feEL the sAMe as iT is lER larhZz...evERyonE lookS so unFamiliaRz..IncluDing aT thE liBraRy iTselF. the LibRariAn lAdy evEn askEd whEtheR we aRE alLowed to comE into thE liBrary. i'm SO sAd to hEar thaTz..hahAaz..but who cARes leR larh..+ + whEn linDa n ruoYinG they ALl sAw mE, theY aLL comE ouT..theN it waS kiNDa noIsy loRhz..dEn eVeryonE was LikE looKin aT mE diFFerenTly..wHoo!! i sO e pAisehz nEHs..>!~~~~~~ *hEhes* tO thiNK of it, chRistopHer (my goD-sOn) looKs sO sAd anD pathEtic noW.. i realLy wiSh thaT yUyUn; PleAse dOn't tORture MY sOn mENtalLY and PhysiCally..yOu Are dEpriving my Son oF hiS fREedom lERz..yOu knoW thaT he StILl lOves yOu dEeply. bUt whY dO you bReak yOUr promiSE to hIm whEn yOu alReadY loSt yOUr fEelinGs towArdS hIm!? yOu knOW he can'T forgEt yoU just lIke thAt..HE's goNna bE maD...PLz..chRis; iF u happEn to SEe mummYz' msG here...plEaSE buCk upz..anD don't huRt youRselF anYmore inCluding mE.. iT huRts mE to SEe yOu bEIng in sucH a stAte. imaGine, i toLd you to fOrget abOut yUyUn, yOu can't. iF i werE to aSk yOu to gO afTer yuYun when i kNOw that sHE's ainT goOD, i'm goinG aGainst mY own wiShz. plZ takE gooD caRe of yoURself wheN i'm no LonGer in teCk whYe... thE liBrary iSn't e Same noW..iT isn'T unDer my coNtroL liAoz. it NOw dEpenDs on e SeniORs; zUlFadLi, chRisTophEr, SonG aIk n teCk wEe.. i knOw that Chris, yOu are e Most PrOmising oNE in the LibRary nOw. and I bELieve yOu caN dO it. plEase get oVer yoUR own ordEral as sOon aS possible And bE e cheERfUL guY i usEd to knoW.. thankz gOdx foR brinGing mE inTo my SEnses..fOr i knoW whAt is exPEcteD Of mE noW..

KL; I migHt haVe beeN wiTh yOu aS stEad (in naME), I knOW that yOu've bEen vERy coMPromiSing anD FurthErmoRe, UP tILL noW, i'm sTill AwaRe of youR feeLIngs...buT soRry..in my hEaRt, thEre's ONly mITchEll, thE onE and thE onLY.......WeIjiaN: mY DeEpest ApoLogiEs..i Didn'T evEn gIVe yOU a chaNCe aT aLL anD i onLY comE to yOu n KL whEN i neeDed hElp..i Didn't EveN chERish You As a fRiENd..thaNks foR waKing mE up tO My sEnseS..anD thaT hAd maDe me realiSEd thaT i sHould eVen chERish alL my friends ARounD mE..anD sHoulD not takE thEM foR granTed.........
